title: Orbit: Computational Tools for Mathematical Explorations
description: A Wolfram Language paclet for recreational and research mathematics, including Chebyshev polygon geometry, prime orbit analysis, and connections to Dirichlet eta/zeta functions.
notes: This is exploratory computational mathematics - numerically verified results, not peer-reviewed proofs. Key findings include: (1) Chebyshev integral theorem generalizations, (2) B-function pole structure encoding Dirichlet eta values, (3) Connections between polygon geometry and zeta functions.
